mapper.select: SELECT cu.user_id , cu.id AS 'id', cu.user_name AS 'name', IF(ua.file_group IS NULL ,NULL,CONCAT(#{fastdfsUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},ua.file_group,'/',ua.attach_path)) AS 'img', mu.user_name FROM maoding_im_group_member tu LEFT JOIN maoding_im_group g on tu.group_id = g.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_user mu on mu.id=tu.account_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user cu ON (tu.account_id = cu.user_id) LEFT JOIN maoding_web_user_attach ua ON ( ua.user_id = cu.user_id AND ua.attach_type = 5 ) WHERE g.group_no = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cu.departure_time IS NULL AND cu.audit_status='1' GROUP BY tu.account_id

SELECT cu.user_id, cu.id AS 'id', cu.user_name AS 'name', IF(ua.file_group IS NULL ,NULL,CONCAT(#{url},ua.file_group,'/',ua.attach_path)) AS 'img', mu.user_name FROM maoding_im_group_member tu LEFT JOIN maoding_web_user mu on mu.id=tu.account_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user cu ON tu.account_id = cu.user_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_user_attach ua ON ( ua.user_id = cu.user_id AND ua.attach_type = 5) WHERE tu.org_id = #{orgId} AND cu.audit_status='1' GROUP BY tu.account_id
